Info.Text: Please ensure Ignition is in the Accessory position. Test will flash the hazard lamps 2 times to indicate program mode is active.
Within 10 seconds, press any button on the fob.
The hazards will flash 2 additional times indicating the fob is learned.
Remove key from ignition cylinder and ensure fob operation. Press Enter to Continue.

Action.Text: Check Ignition is in the Accessory position and press Next!
Remove key from ignition cylinder and ensure fob operation. Press Enter to Continue.
